name: Soothing Hydra Solution™ PRO Face Mask for Irritated Skin
about: What it is: A cooling, hydrating face mask that soothes irritation, supports the skin barrier, and balances moisture levels after one use...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Oiliness..Formulation: Mask..Highlighted Ingredients:- Beta Glucan and Allantoin: Soothe skin..- Panthenol: Cares for a weakened skin barrier..- Inositol: Improves moisture levels...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES...What Else You Need to Know: Crafted with a cooling water-gel sheet infused with allantoin, this upgraded mask is gentle on skin. It visibly balances moisture and oil levels, intensely hydrates, and restores skin’s barrier for a calm, healthy-looking complexion...Clinical Results:.Clinical results after one use:..+ Immediately improves hydration levels by 115%.*.+ Immediately strengthens skin’s moisture barrier by +58%*.+ Keeps skin hydrated for 24 hours...*Clinical testing conducted on 32 females; 22-58 years; dry skin type, after 1 time use. Effect varies by individual.
ingredients: -Beta Glucan and Allantoin: Soothe skin..-Panthenol: Cares for a weakened skin barrier..-Inositol: Improves moisture levels....Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Inositol, Panthenol, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Glyceryl Glucoside, Trehalose, Betaine, Erythritol, Saccharide Isomerate, Allantoin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Beta-Glucan, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Dipropylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Glyceryl Stearate, Tromethamine, Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Citrate, Hydroxyacetophenone.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Unfold face mask and gently apply to clean skin..-Leave on for 15 to 20 minutes..-Remove and massage excess product into skin..-Use three times a week or when skin needs soothing support..-Follow with Cicapair™ Sensitive Skin Moisturizer (sold separately).

reviews.review_title: A hero for the skin barrier
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a godsend for the skin barrier. Truly so hydrating and replenishing. I’ve been struggling with my skin for a while, both with breakouts and a depleted barrier, and this helped to heal and prepare my skin before makeup aplication. All of my other products settled so great after using this, and my skin was radiant and refreshed. Did not cause ant breakouts, instead soothed my skin. Love this so much!!!
Amazing! I suffer from redness and this was so soothing and no fragrance. I am so putting it in the fridge next time. A new staple in my home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this mask for over 5 years now and my sensitive skin loves this mask for hydration.

reviews.review_title: This product made my skin feel and look so healthy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My face felt so nice and looked very dewy and soft after this face mask. My skin is especially dry since I’m on acne meds but my skin was so replenished and healthy afterwards!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is great. I recently started retinol and my skin was so dry & thirsty so i used this mask before bed and the morning after she was glowing and soft and HYDRATED!

reviews.review_title: When you need that extra pick me up
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product once, I immediately bought another. My skin was so juicy, plumped and very hydrated, I love how skin glass like it was. I kept mine on for 20 mins and seen incredible results after just one use.
